logic

Interface ClientInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Client, ClientModel

    public interface ClientInterface
    Describes the interface for model classes. Created by OmniBox on 01-11-2014.

    • Method Detail

      • defineAuthentication

        void defineAuthentication(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String password)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                 java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Define Authentication. Receives username and password for authentication purpose. If data inserted is not valid, state should remain WaitAuthentication, if its valid, then state should move to WaitRequest. Exception should be handle on interface level, because this way its more flexible to create custom interfaces.
        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • defineGetRequest

        void defineGetRequest(OmniFile fileToGet)
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                             java.io.IOException,
                             java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Define Get Request. Receives desired OmniFile to get. It should return state WaitAnswer if there are no errors and if your waiting for an answer from the other end. If not, then return WaitRequest. Exceptions should be handle on interface level, because this way its more flexible to create custom interfaces.
        Parameters:
        fileToGet -
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

                       throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                              java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Define Send Request. Receives desired OmniFile to send. It should return state WaitAnswer if there are no errors and if your waiting for an answer from the other end. If not, then return WaitRequest. Exceptions should be handle on interface level, because this way its more flexible to create custom interfaces.

      • defineRemoveRequest

        void defineRemoveRequest(OmniFile fileToRemove)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.lang.InterruptedException
        Define Remove Request. Receives desired OmniFile to remove. It should return state WaitAnswer if there are no errors and if your waiting for an answer from the other end. If not, then return WaitRequest. Exceptions should be handle on interface level, because this way its more flexible to create custom interfaces.

      • defineMulticastRequest

        void defineMulticastRequest()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Define Multicast Request. Responsible for handling multicast connection if implemented. Exception should be handle on interface level, because this way its more flexible to create custom interfaces.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
